# alkira_peering_gateway_azure_vnet_third_party_connector_attachment (Data Source)

This data source allows to retrieve an existing Azure VNET Third Party Connector Attachment by its name.

<<<<<<< HEAD
This data source allows you to retrieve an existing Azure VNET Third Party Connector Attachment by its name.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "alkira_azure_vnet_third_party_connector_attachment" "example" {
  name = "azure-vnet-attachment"
}
```
